s1.name: JORAM History
s1.subtitle: January, 16th 2002: Documentation update
s1.p: The Installation guide has been updated to take into account Ant support.
s1.subtitle: January, 16th 2002: JORAM 2.2 (cvs tag: joram2_2)
s1.p:
This version adds support for Ant build system. Package and documentation will follow soon...
Have a look JORAM CVS repository
s1.subtitle: Documentation
s1.p: Documentation is now made in DocBook. You can now download all JORAM documentation in PostScript or PDF (it is still available online in HTML).
s1.subtitle: 14 September 2001: JORAM 2.1.1 (cvs tag: joram2_1_1)
s1.p: This version corrects some bugs concerning the selectors. Null selectors are now authorized, syntax is systematically checked and Strings syntax has been enlarged to characters such as '/', ';', ...
s1.subtitle: 31 August 2001: JORAM 2.1.0 (cvs tag: joram2_1_0)

ul.li: New feature: message selection (see JMS spec section 3.8).
Bug: the problem when sending objects not "known" by the agents server inside an ObjectMessage does not occur anymore. No need now to add this object's class in the agents server classpath.

s1.subtitle: 15 May 2001: JORAM 2.0.1 (cvs tag: joram2_0_1)
s1.p: This version closely follows the 2.0.0 and provides improvements in the management of closing sockets, and a better handling of stopping threads when closing Sessions, ConnectionConsumers and Connections.
s1.subtitle: 7 May 2001: JORAM 2.0.0 (cvs tag: joram2_0_0) fully implements the Application Server Facilities (ASF)

ul.li: New features: ASF part of the specification, synchronous reception on topics and asynchronous reception on queues have been implemented.
JORAM and JOnAS provide Message Driven Beans support.
Bugs have been fixed: ConnectionFactories accept now more than one active Connection at a time, and problems while running JORAM under Solaris are solved.

s1.subtitle: 5 December 2000: JORAM included in JOnAS
s1.p: JOnAS tagged 2.2.2 includes JORAM in its distribution. JOnAS 2.2.2 / JORAM 1.1.0 allow using JMS from Enterprise Java Beans and have been successfully tested on AIX, Linux, Solaris, NT and Windows 2000.
s1.subtitle: 10 October 2000: JORAM is now tagged 1.1.0 (cvs tag: joram1_1_0)

ul.li: New feature: JORAM now includes a JNDI "light" implementation (JNDI 1.1.2).
XA classes have been successfully tested through JOnAS EJB implementation.

s1.subtitle: 31 August 2000 : JORAM implements more

ul.li: XA classes, allowing JMS operations to be involved in a distributed transaction, are available.

s1.subtitle: 28 June 2000 : a demo is available
s1.p: The demo simulates an e-commerce application: several participants interact through asynchronous and synchronous messages exchange. The demo is available in CVS, joram_src_jar.zip, joram_src_jar.tar.gz, demoCommerce.tar.gz and demoCommerce.zip.
s1.subtitle: 26 May 2000 : JORAM first open source version available !
